entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 9:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries and rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 3 cm inland. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
